summary: This bill, the "Disclose Getting Involved in Foreign Transactions Act" (Disclose GIFT Act), amends the Higher Education Act of 1965. It mandates that institutions of higher education report foreign gifts and contracts received by faculty and staff. It requires the establishment of a public, searchable database of this information and the implementation of a plan to manage potential risks. The bill also includes enforcement mechanisms, potential fines for non-compliance, and a Government Accountability Office (GAO) study to improve agency coordination regarding implementation of the Act. Lastly, it adds a requirement related to program participation agreements.
